ygData.subject: Another Nerf (but we can't complain about this one!)
ygData.msgSnippet: Hot off the www.eqvault.com presses:  I guess we can t complain as long as it s a REASONABLE Cap! Today s patch primarily contained preparations for Kunark,
ygData.messageBody:
Hot off the www.eqvault.com presses: I guess we can't complain as long as
it's a REASONABLE Cap!


Today's patch primarily contained preparations for Kunark, including some
new art. There was also a bug that was fixed with a bard song that was put
in last Tuesday. The song (a charm upgrade) was not capped. Someone was kind
enough to send us a screenshot of someone with a *really nice* pet named
Cazic-Thule.

-Gordon

Slyde Katzenjammer

39th Level Bard of Xegony
